text: Ancient Ripperdactyl
The largest and most bloodthirsty Ripperdactyl, with talons sharp as razors capable of decapitating foes, leaving a trail of viscera and limbs in its wake.
Ancient Ripperdactyl
The largest and most bloodthirsty Ripperdactyl, with talons sharp as razors capable of decapitating foes, leaving a trail of viscera and limbs in its wake.
God-Touched: Nehekhara's Emperor
The Immortal Emperor, King of Kings! Bow to none, ruler of all!
Holy Titan Incarnation: Khemrian Lion
Ptra's most noble blessing, granting the Immortal Emperor the golden body and supreme power he has long desired.
Holy Titan Incarnation: Arkhan's Black Tower Scorpion
Arkhan drained the immense dark magic of the Black Tower, unleashing the power left by Nagash within him.
Nagash's Loyal Servant: The Necromantic End
Nagash's most loyal servant, wielding pure and formidable necromantic power.
Holy Titan Incarnation: Labaras' Viper
The blessing of Asaph ignited the Warrior Queen's desire for vengeance, transforming into the cold bite of her bowstring.
Holy Titan Incarnation: Khemrian Eagle
The exiled High Priest of the Tomb Cult earned Tahoth's recognition for his contributions to Nehekhara.
Tomb Giant Dragon
Perfected by Tomb Technicians over generations on a massive obsidian slab, it now soars above the pyramids, carrying the Tomb Kings in defiance of the heavens.
Ulatip Vulture
This giant vulture is adorned with the bones of its god's enemies. The cost to tame this stormy shadow remains unknown.

Obsidian War Elephant
Awakened Tomb Technicians ride these majestic creations, their solemn banners heralding awe and fear across the battlefield.
Divine Avatar: Ushabti of the Lion
Tomb princes rest in the sands; wielding pawns, they become lions.
Soulbound Avatar: Carved Ushabti
Bound with obsidian, their fiery wrath is unending.
Ursun's Winter (Elemental Bear)
A statue of the Bear God mounted on a colossal frost construct, reigning over cold and death, inseparably linked to Kislev and Ursun's divine favor.
